p:
The confidence intervals shown in Supplementary NotesÂ 2 and 4 are 95% highest density intervals of Eq. (2). In principle, the parameters of the Beta prior could be chosen to reflect additional data such as seroconversion histories; however, care should be taken to specify informative priors based on variables such as age differences or age-specific disease prevalence
20 , in order to avoid circular inferences on who may have infected whom.
